name: Meteorite (VilMan Studios)
description:
Oh no! Meteorites are falling from the sky! Be a hero and save your planet!

Meteorite is an endless game where the objective is to destroy meteorites falling from space to earth by tapping on them. 

Upcoming things - Currency, Planets, More meteorites types, Imrpoved graphics, Settings, Sounds, Sound tracks and a lot more!

Current version - Beta

*Game is currently in early Beta version*
